message.content:
cs.RO, cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.GR, cs.MM

Reasoning: 
- cs.RO (Robotics): The paper proposes an intelligent agent that supervises motion planning of a filming drone based on aesthetical values of video shots using deep reinforcement learning. This involves designing and implementing a robot (drone) that can learn and make decisions based on its environment and objectives.
- cs.CV (Computer Vision): The paper involves using computer vision techniques to extract aesthetical features of retrospective shots in order to extract a desirable policy for better prospective shots. This involves analyzing and processing visual data to make decisions.
- cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence): The paper proposes a learning scheme which exploits aesthetical features of retrospective shots in order to extract a desirable policy for better prospective shots. This involves designing and implementing an intelligent agent that can learn and make decisions based on its environment and objectives.
- cs.GR (Graphics): The paper involves generating and analyzing video shots for aerial cinematography. This involves designing and implementing graphics algorithms and techniques to create visually appealing shots.
- cs.MM (Multimedia): The paper involves analyzing and processing multimedia data (video shots) to make decisions for aerial cinematography. This involves designing and implementing algorithms and techniques for multimedia analysis and processing.
